titleStmt.title: A Christian and modest offer of a most indifferent conference, or disputation, about the maine and principall controversies betwixt the prelats, and the late silenced and deprived ministers in England tendered by some of the said ministers to the archbishops, and bishops, and all their adherents.
titleStmt.author: Jacob, Henry, 1563-1624.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
